Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our unique and highly valuable product to you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than what it costs us. Considering its true value to you, we're offering this exceptional item for $9,500. This price not only reflects its worth but also provides you with an opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a premium rate compared to its market value of $8,000. We trust this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your needs. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
